plot outline: JK is an actor, who leads a happily married life. When he is shooting on the outskirts of the city and living at his farm house, his family is suddenly privy to some rather unnatural happenings around them. What is the cause for these and who is to blame for it all?
title: May 1st
plot: JK is an actor, who leads a happily married life. When he is shooting on the outskirts of the city and living at his farm house, his family is suddenly privy to some rather unnatural happenings around them. What is the cause for these and who is to blame for it all?::Sukanya Suresh
